metadata.title: CVE-2024-23918 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Improper conditions check in some Intel(R) Xeon(R) processor memorycontroller configurations when using Intel(R) SGX may allow a privilegeduser to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-23918` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20241112.0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20241112.0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
